claim.text: Canada's R-2000 program, launched by Natural Resources Canada in 1982
claim.claim: Canada's R-2000 program was launched by Natural Resources Canada in 1982

results.summary: The R-2000 program was launched in 1982, but the original administering body was Energy, Mines and Resources Canada (EMR), not Natural Resources Canada.
results.detail: The R-2000 program was indeed launched in 1982 as a voluntary technical standard for energy-efficient housing in Canada. However, Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) was not created until 1995 when it was formed by merging Energy, Mines and Resources Canada with Forestry Canada. At the time of R-2000's 1982 launch, the program was administered by Energy, Mines and Resources Canada. NRCan later inherited and continued the program.
